item.title: Dabur Herb'l Sensitive Toothpaste is designed to combat tooth demineralization in the Middle East
item.description:
Source: Dabur International. Dabur International has introduced its new Herbâ€™l Sensitive Toothpaste to the Middle East market. This toothpaste uses natural ingredients, including cinnamon, mint, licorice root, and potassium ions to quickly and effectively alleviate tooth sensitivity. The company states that using this toothpaste twice daily will not only reduce sensitivity but also lead to healthier gums. It does this by preventing plaque buildup, gum inflammation, and cavities, all while freshening breath...
